definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to meet a possible marriage partner

sentences.english: The first memory bank corresponding to a first range of addresses.
sentences.chinese: 第一存储体与第一范围的地址相对应。

sentences.english: We might even see-saw between both counterproductive poles.
sentences.chinese: 我们甚至可能看到双方针锋相对的情况。

sentences.english: Compared with utterance understanding, pragmatic presupposition has the basic features of appropriateness and common acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 相对于话语理解，语用预设具备合适性和共知性。

sentences.english: Performance of coating plate with the special hydrophobic coating solution was better.
sentences.chinese: 采用双疏涂层溶液涂覆的多孔板相对好一些。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: But that is the effect of relative dollar depreciation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这却是美元相对贬值的实际结果。

sentences.english: Accelerators are generally used in near-surface applications in which the temperature is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 速凝剂一般在温度相对较低的接近地面的情况下使用。

sentences.english: High relief and shallow relief is relative to the two types.
sentences.chinese: 高浮雕与浅浮雕是相对的两种类型。

sentences.english: their relatively small scale makes it easier, and far faster, for them to adopt green frameworks.
sentences.chinese: 相对较小的规模使生态城采用绿色架构更容易更快速。

sentences.english: In any event, protecting yourself against such a case is relatively easy.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，防止自己摊上这种官司相对比较容易。

sentences.english: What better way to hurt them than with the subversive idea of freedom?
sentences.chinese: 有什么能够比针锋相对的自由思想更能刺痛他们呢？

sentences.english: Yang is the muscling principle in nature and Yin is the opposite.
sentences.chinese: 阴和阳是贯通整个世界的两个相对立的力量。

sentences.english: A relatively high exposure to the U.S. consumer.
sentences.chinese: 在美国消费者中相对高的曝光度。

sentences.english: Yet the superstore trend is relatively new to China.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在中国大卖场是相对新的发展潮流。

sentences.english: For Israel and the Philistines had put the battle in array, army against army.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人和非利士人都摆列队伍，彼此相对。

sentences.english: The roof was supported by a comparatively traditional post-and-beam system.
sentences.chinese: 建筑屋顶由相对传统的后梁系统支撑。

definition: range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
